casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harley Ray ALLIGOOD, Jr. No. 31P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Harley Ray Alligood, Jr., Lumberton, for Alligood, Harley Ray, Jr. Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of September 2015 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
